org.eclipse.ditto.examples:ColorableLamp.description: ColorableLamp defines state+behavior of a Lamp which is colorable

configurationProperties.name: bulbChangeDate
configurationProperties.description: Contains the date when the bulb was last changed

configurationProperties.name: reportCurrentPowerConsumption
configurationProperties.description: Configures whether the device shall report its status 'currentPowerConsumption' or not

configurationProperties.name: currentPowerConsumptionInterval
configurationProperties.description: Configures the interval of how often the status 'currentPowerConsumption' shall be updated

configurationProperties.name: on
configurationProperties.description: Configuration whether the switch should be on or off

statusProperties.name: currentPowerConsumption
statusProperties.description: Status of the current power consumtion in Watts

operations.name: red
operations.description: Overwrites the current 'red' value of the configured 'color' returning the new color

operations.name: green
operations.description: Overwrites the current 'green' value of the configured 'color' returning the new color

operations.name: blue
operations.description: Overwrites the current 'blue' value of the configured 'color'  returning the new color

operations.name: rgb
operations.description: Overwrites the current 'r', 'g' and 'b' values of the configured 'color'  returning the new color

operations.name: retrieveRed
operations.description: Retrieves the 'red' part of the currently configured 'color'

operations.name: retrieveGreen
operations.description: Retrieves the 'green' part of the currently configured 'color'

operations.name: retrieveBlue
operations.description: Retrieves the 'blue' part of the currently configured 'color'

operations.name: gradientColorChange
operations.description: Changes the color via a gradient, starting with the passed in 'startingColor', ending at the 'targetColor'

operations.name: gradientColorChangeDuringInterval
operations.description: Changes the color via a gradient, starting with the passed in 'startingColor', ending at the 'targetColor' during the given 'interval'

operations.name: gradientFadeToColor
operations.description: Change the currently configured color with a gradient to the passed in 'targetColor'

operations.name: toggle
operations.description: Toggles the current 'on' configuration by negating it and returning the new 'on' value as response

operations.name: switchOnFor
operations.description: Switches the switchable on for a passed in duration, afterwards applying the previous 'on' configuration again
